## Principles

- Use [Markdown](/research/writing_technical.html) for manuscripts, presentations, and knowledge management.
- Use Git to version, collaborate, and share.

The principles are reflected in the [paper template](/research/writing_technical.html), the [presentation template](/research/presentation.html),
and the [thesis template](https://github.com/fs-ise/quarto-template-thesis){target=_blank}.

## Ethics

Research is conducted in accordance with the [Guidelines for Safeguarding Good Research Practice](https://zenodo.org/records/6472827){target=_blank}
as well as the [AIS Code of Research Conduct](https://aisnet.org/page/AdmBullCResearchCond){target=_blank}.
